https://tmrev.io/movie/276379-April Is My Religion 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null College is far more than beer bashes and sex romps, cute hook-ups and classes. It can also be the seamiest and strangest place to finally grow up. That's what a freshman, Jack Wesson, discovers when he graduates and attends a university, where hard drugs and mind-bending relationships usher him into the hard knocks of adulthood. Having completely lost control of his life, Jack must claw his way back to solid ground. April Is My Religion
